Technovation

IEEE R10 Event

TechnoVation is a technical cum leadership enhancement event involving a range of activities that enhance leadership skills. The event will start off with a workshop on leadership skills involved in leading IEEE affiliated organizations as well as benefits of IEEE membership keeping in mind the objective of 'LEADERSHIP TRAINING AND DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM'. It will be followed by a coding event where the budding coders can get a chance to showcase their technical skills and a 14 hour long hardware hackathon that not only involves testing of technical skills but also how leadership skills are applied to solve problems more effectively. The event will enable enhancement of leadership skills and their application in solving technical problems in order to come up with the most optimum solution agreeable by all. The event also brings about more awareness in terms of how IEEE affiliated organizations are led and their functioning.

Participate And Have Fun !!

  • Aug. 24, 2015
